Text: what a fantastic mix of some very very odd rare 80's songs.......thank you very very much
I love these mixes you have put here for us. Wondering, do you have the entire album for Blue Zoo? good stuff.
AS1002MSB thx for the kind words. I do have the full lp [2 X 2] and will up it in the next few days.

Perfect mix and selection on this volume, just great!!!  In fact, many of these obscure bands are as good as the big famous of the 80's. I am happy to can hear them as well. Thanks for your impressive work and good taste 80zforever. You rules!
Just to name a few, that would be great to listen to more of The Metros, and Microdisney.
I can't wait to check it out!  Although it looks like I'll be waiting to get it...
